sentences: the pharmacokinetics of tolbutamide in all vinegar-baked radix bupleuri-treated rats showed no statistically significant difference (p > 0.05) from that of controlled rats, however, treatment of radix bupleuri decreased tolbutamide t1/2.

the plasma concentrations of the six probes were measured by high performance liquid chromatography-triple quadrupole mass spectrometry (hplc-ms/ms) and their corresponding pharmacokinetic parameters were calculated. results: the auc and t1/2 of midazolam, dextromethorphan and chlorzoxazone decreased significantly (p < 0.05) in rats after different dosing of radix bupleuri or vinegar-baked radix bupleuri for seven days.
